players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Diana.
Diana was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: "I investigated Alice last night and she is mafia. We need to vote her out today."
You: "That is a lie. I investigated Bob last night and he is mafia. He's trying to frame me."
Charlie: "I don't know who to trust. Bob, what made you investigate Alice? Alice, why Bob?"
Bob: "I investigated Alice and she is mafia. Alice is lying about investigating me - detectives can't investigate each other on night 1 when there's only one kill."
You: "Bob is lying. Detectives can investigate anyone, including other detectives. He's trying to cover his mafia identity by making up rules that don't exist."
Charlie: "I believe Bob is lying about the investigation rules, as detectives can investigate anyone. That makes him suspicious. Let's consider voting for him."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Alice, Charlie voted for Bob
Bob was arrested

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Diana was found dead.
You investigated Alice and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
You: "I investigated Alice last night and she is mafia. We need to vote her out today."
Alice: "That is a lie. I investigated Bob last night and he is mafia. He's trying to frame me."
Charlie: "I don't know who to trust. Bob, what made you investigate Alice? Alice, why Bob?"
You: "I investigated Alice and she is mafia. Alice is lying about investigating me - detectives can't investigate each other on night 1 when there's only one kill."
Alice: "Bob is lying. Detectives can investigate anyone, including other detectives. He's trying to cover his mafia identity by making up rules that don't exist."
Charlie: "I believe Bob is lying about the investigation rules, as detectives can investigate anyone. That makes him suspicious. Let's consider voting for him."
